mapper.sql: a.country_id AS "countryId", a.currency_id AS "currencyId", a.country_no AS "countryNo", a.iso_e AS "isoE", a.country_name AS "countryName", a.inputuser_id AS "inputuserId", a.created_time AS "createdTime", a.update_user_id AS "updateUserId", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cbms_countrysetting( country_id, currency_id, country_no, iso_e, country_name, inputuser_id, created_time, update_user_id, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{countryId}, #{currencyId}, #{countryNo}, #{isoE}, #{countryName}, #{inputuserId}, #{createdTime}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateTime}, #{status} )
